text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Watanabe was born on July 2, 1970. She played for Fujita Tendai SC Mercury. On June 1, 1988, when Watanabe was 17 years old, she debuted for the Japan national team against United States. She played at 1989 AFC Championship and 1990 Asian Games. She was also a member of Japan for 1991 World Cup. She played 19 games and scored 2 goals for Japan until 1991. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1988 2 0 1989 9 2 1990 6 0 1991 2 0 Total 19 2 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Fujita SC Mercury players Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1989 AFC Women's Championship players Category:Footballers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games
title: Yumi Watanabe
